page.title: 04Junior Sport in Salterton
page.content: The{Football Club,}in Greenway Lane,is free to boys and girls. The{Budleigh Salterton Cricket Club has a Colts section which costs a pound to join.Sessions are held on Monday nights,with matches on Friday nights.The ground is at Ottermouth. Junior{tennis at the Games Club}costs one pound and sessions are held on a Saturday morning.They have short tennis as well as grass and hard courts.Membership for a season for juniors is six pounds. The Golf Club is on the top of the cliffs and you can have a lesson on Saturday mornings.It costs fifty pence for a half hour lesson or ten pounds a year for membership. There is a BMX track in Greenway Lane which is free.
